data.title: Catch Me I'm Falling
data.meta_description:
Catch Me I'm Falling by Pierre Sibille, released 23 February 2015

1. Catch Me I'm Falling
2. Ain't Worth A Damn
3. La fille de l'iPhone
4. Lou Full Of Joy
5. Light In Senegal
6. To Old Friends
7. Les Regrets
8. Love The Way You Love Me
9. I Tried To Tell You
10. If You See Me Coming
11. I Love You More Than You'll Ever Know
12. Mon Camarade
13. No Way Out
14. I Believe In Love

Sortie France de Catch Me I’m Falling, nouvel album de Pierre Sibille le 23 Février 2015 (Quart de Lune / UVM)
data.text:
1.

Catch Me I'm Falling 04:15

Hey here I go going snow blind Hey here I go losing my mind So what's happ'ning? Girl what you do is your voodoo, it's your ju ju Babe I don't know where to go now So I'm begging Come on and catch me I'm Falling Help me I'm calling out to you Catch me I'm Falling Help me, I'm calling out to you Ya Got me hooked and I can't shake it So don't let me down You know I never planned to fall in love with you It was just a little one night fling You cast a spell on me and got me hooked Now ya say it doesn’t mean a thing Ya Got me hooked and I can't shake it No don't let me down Come on an’ Catch me I'm Falling Help me, I'm calling out to you (…) Ya Got me hooked and I can't shake it No don't let me down

2.

Ain't Worth A Damn 03:59

Sundown a long night ahead without sleeping And you on my mind all the time I can't seem to find No peace of mind Ain't worth damn without your love Sunrise the day's startin wrong without you baby Alone in our bed I cry Why'd you have to go? All that I know Ain't worth a damn without your love Noon Time can't eat a bite, ain't hungry, babe With you out of sight can't fight the fight It's hard to move on now that you are gone Ain't worth a damn without your love No Time a' day or night without you, baby I Just can't seem to get things right I Can't see straight, I can't concentrate Ain't worth a damn without your love.. My obsession, won't turn me loose Got ya on my mind all night and day (I really mean it girl) I try to forget you, but it ain't no use All I do is hope and pray

3.

La fille de l'iPhone 03:25

J'ai rendez-vous avec un canon Dans un restau connu pour ses additions. Caviar, champagne et grands bordeaux, Pour ma très belle, rien n'est trop beau. On sert le foie gras poêlé Mais y a quelqu'un qui vient de l'appeler Ell' répond et bla et bla bla bla, Le foie, ma foi, est déjà froid!... Belle, tu devrais couper ton iPhone, Cette nuit, c'est Graham Bell ou moi... Belle, cess' tes sms et j'te donne Le numéro rose du Kama Sutra. Six mois plus tard, une fille de rêve... Je buvais ses mots sur ses lèvres. Je voyais des volcans dans ses yeux, C'était chaud bouillant- oh! Mon Dieu! Mais soudain, j'entends la petite Qui dit:«Darling, I just have to tweet », Que je jette un œil à mon profil... Voilà son facebook qui défile. Belle, tu devrais couper ton iPhone, Cette nuit, c'est tes emails ou moi. Belle, cess' tes sms et j'te donne Le numéro rose du Kama Sutra. J'ai final'ment trouvé l'oiseau rare, Le nec plus ultra, le nectar. Quand j'ai proposé de l'épouser, Ell' m'a dit: «Chéri, ok.». A la mairie, quand l'édile a dit: «Voulez-vous prendre pour mari Pierre Sibille?» Ell' répond:«D'accord, Mais faut qu'j'appelle ma mère d'abord.»! Belle, tu devrais couper ton iPhone, Aujourd'hui, ton seul appel, c'est moi!... Belle, cess' tes sms et j' te donne Le numéro rose du Kama Sutra. J'en ai marre de ton smartphone, ma chérie, J'vais blacklister ton blackberry, now ! No, no, no, no, no that Nokia ! Stop singing your Samsung… Ah put it away Baby ! Let’s try a new sensation ! You and me have a conversation… Avoid that android darling! Baby, baby !

4.

Lou Full Of Joy 03:20

You've got my soul you're name is Lou full of joy You light my soul and I thank you, just for all A beauty queen that changed my life, looking' me as a King You've got my soul you're name is Lou full of Joy You've got my soul (…) You've got my soul you're name is Lou full of Joy Oh, baby

5.

Light In Senegal 03:49

There is a light in Senegal, that I'll always see Just down the street in children eyes, That ever shine on me We all know, cos we're not bling And I'll always see There is a light in Senegal That ever shine on me, shine on Me, me, me, me, in Senegal There's just a light, light, light, light In Senegal Yaw welcome to senegal foumou nek moye West africa fi Moye Deukou Dabakh Bamba Ah Baye Laye Boye Weur Salaam Yeksina, Peace Love And Harmony Dikeul djew fi loloye Arme bi Un Peuple Un But Une Foie Sounou Devise Ngui Ma Delou Wahati Geustou Gnanati Wadioure Yi Gnou Same Xaleyi Ndah Gouneyi Gnoye Avenirou Rew Mi Euleuk Deuk Bou Amouli Gouneh Gnakk Natangue La Protection Des Enfants Doit Etre Une Priorite Pour Tous Respectons Leur droit Et Leur Devoir... Sister Coumbis Sorra Latigué yelen ma senegal yé, Latiguè ben ma ani diarabi ma senegal yé, Bè bé donguili da la sénégal yé Mano bé donguili da la senegal yé BLUES'UP bé donguili da la sénégal yé. bè bé donguili da la senegal yé. There is a hope, in Senegal, ooh the future's gonna be Filled with some joy and happiness That's the day I wanna see We can help brighten the children's eyes We have the tools, we have the key! There is a light in Senegal That ever shine on me, Shine on me, me, me, me in Senegal, go on shine on me! Just a light, light, light, light in Senegal Ever shine on me, ever shine on me! And I'll always see! There is a light in Senegal, shine on me That ever shine on me, Shine on me, me, me, me in Senegal And I'll always see! Shine on me I'll always see! Shine on me Just a light, light, light, light in Senegal…

6.

To Old Friends 03:36

Every time that I hear a guitar wailing I think about old friends from long ago And though we've never met you're always with me You taught me almost everything I know Hey Johnny Guitar Watson Hey Mickey Baker, B.B. King Hey Jimi keep on rocking You taught me,damn near everything Every time that I hear a keyboard grooving I think about old friends from long ago The licks I heard you play they got me moving You taught me almost everything I know Hey Stevie Wonder, hi there Ray Charles Hello Doctor John and Booker T, keep On Grooving! Friends if I'm out here playing, thanks to you It's my way of saying thanks to you Everytime that I heard some soulful singing I think about old friends from long ago And all the joy and sorrow you're still bringing You taught me almost everything I know Hey Donny, Marvin, Nina - thanks to you Here's to Nick and Valerie, Thank You! James, Otis and Aretha, thanks to You It's my way of saying thanks to you

7.

Les Regrets 03:54

Il est bien rare qu’on se souvienne, De nos erreurs dispersées, Il est trop tard quand elles reviennent, Le soir pour nous transpercer. J’ai bien trop tard compris la chance, De mon bonheur renversé, Sur le boulevard de l’insouciance, Le soir où je vous ai quitté. Je vous aurais dit de belles choses, Mais le vent est assassin, Quand il laisse les portes closes, Sur les regrets qui sont les miens. Je vous aurais dit de belles choses. Et par hasard, on s’est croisé Sur le trottoir de mes torts, Pas un regard à m’adresser, Juste un « Bonsoir, restez pas dehors. » Dans le miroir qui s’est cassé, A la lueur inversée, Je vous adresse toutes mes pensées, Ce soir où je vais tout quitter... Je vous aurais dit de belles choses, Mais le vent est assassin, Quand il laisse les portes closes, Sur les regrets qui sont les miens. Je vous aurais dit de belles choses.

8.

They say that, Sadie ain't a lady When she rocks up the bed But baby don't you worry I want you instead I love the way you love me Love the way you love me I hear, Daisy drives you crazy She knows just what to do But you and me are hotter Cause we got no taboos I love the way you love me Love the way you love me They say, Judy's got a booty That you have to admire But she don't do her duty When it comes to desire I love the way you love me Love the way you love me You know, Grace has got a face Sets a heart on fire But you got something better Make this man perspire I love the way you love me Love the way you love me Oh honey I could shop around Look some more, but that would be a crime I got the best, don't need the rest So why go wasting time I love the way you love me Love the way you love me

9.

I tried to tell you Oh no no You wouldn't listen no no no I tried to tell you We don't talk together lately All we ever do is shout Don't know how to reach you baby How to work things out (I Tried to tell you) Every time I try to fix it You just turn away baby (You never listen) It's a losing game we're playing I don't think that I can stay I've been loving you for so long Won't you tell me where we went wrong We needed to communicate Saying what we're thinking baby We shut the door - and close our mind That's maybe why we are sinking Ah ah/ ah ah ah I tried to tell you… You don't ever pay attention When I try to tell you my side All you do is read your paper Or run away and hide/ I tried to tell you It's a one way conversation Talking to a wall/ I tried to tell you There ain't time for our relations You just let it fall I've been loving you for so long Won't you tell me where we went wrong We needed to communicate Saying what we're thinking baby We shut the door - and close our mind That's maybe why we are sinking Ah ah/ ah ah ah I tried to tell you…

10.

Scuse me if I seem a bit off kilter I amaze myself with stupid things I do Life seems to be so helter skelter Can't help it but I seem to dwell on you Though I know for us it's over But I can't believe we're really through So, if you see me coming, don't pay no mind My feet don't remember it's over And if you hear me calling, don't be unkind My fingers just keep dialing your number Lately I wander into your part town A fatal attraction I can't shake Losing you has really brought me way down Sometimes it feels like more that I can't take Though I know for us it's over But I can't believe we're really through So, if you see me coming, don't pay no mind My feet don't remember it's over And if you hear me calling, don't be unkind My fingers just keep dialing your number

11.

If I ever leave you baby, You can say I told you so! And if I ever hurt you, You know I hurt myself as well. Is that any way for a man to carry on Do you think I want my loved one gone Said I love you More than you'll ever know More than you'll ever know When I wasn't making much money You know where my paycheck went You know I brought it home to you baby And I never spent a red cent Is that any way for a man to carry on Do you think I want my loved one gone Said I love you More than you'll ever know More than you'll ever know I'm only flesh and blood But I can be everything that you demand I can be king of everything Or just a tiny grain of sand Is that anyway for a man to carry on Do you think he wants his little loved one gone Said I love you More than you'll ever know More than you'll ever know

12.

Mon Camarade 04:19

Je n'sais plus combien ça fait d'mois Qu'on s'est rencontrés, toi et moi Mais depuis, tous deux, on s'balade... On n'prend jamais le vent debout C'est lui qui pousse et on s'en fout Mon camarade ... En avril, tous les prés sont verts Ils sont tout blancs quand c'est l'hiver En mars, ils sont en marmelade Mais il y a pour deux vagabonds Un coin d'étable où il fait bon Mon camarade ! On s'souviendra du balthazar Qu'on a fait ce soir, par hasard Avec un vieux corbeau malade... On a tout mangé, même les os Et tu vas roupiller bientôt Mon camarade... V'là la première étoile qui luit Les grenouilles, dans l'fin fond d'la nuit En chœur, lui font une sérénade... Les grenouilles ont des p'tits points d'or Dans les yeux, tu l'savais ?... Tu dors Mon camarade ... Je me demande, certains jours Pourquoi nous poursuivons toujours Cette éternelle promenade... Oui, c'est parc'qu'on n'a pas trouvé Le bonheur qu'on avait rêvé... Mon camarade... Un jour, on s'ra tout ébahis On arrivera dans un pays Plein de fleurs, d'oiseaux, de cascades... On s'ra reçus à bras ouverts Y aura des carillons dans l'air ! Mon camarade ! Y aura une petite blonde pour moi Et puis une petite brune pour toi Qui trouves que les blondes c'est trop fade... Elles nous trouveront bien à leur goût Et diront : Venez donc chez nous ! Mon camarade... On trouvera ça, mais oui, mon vieux ! C'est peut-être là-haut, dans les cieux Dame, faudra pas rester en rade... On a tant marché ici-bas Qu'y a pas d'raison qu'on n'y arrive pas ! Mon camarade !

13.

No Way Out 02:54

Ya caught me in your trap And there is no way out You snap your little fingers I come running You locked up my heart And I can’t break loose Should have known from the start There’s no use You got me in your web Like a hopeless fly No way that I’ll Be escaping Between you and me I don’t wanna be free Keep on keeping the chain on my heart It’s clear to see You got me where I want you It’s clear to me Gotta be right beside you girl Throw ‘way the key cause ya know I ain’t going Couldn’t break away now Lord I wouldn’t know how Ya caught me in your trap And there is no way out You snap your little fingers I come running You locked up my heart And I can’t break loose Should have known from the start There’s no use
